In a message dated 2/15/03 4:42:10 PM Central Standard Time, 
airly2002@... writes:


> "It's time that you come back to Maximal base, Maxima"said Hydras"They may 
> notice that you're not there"

Standing, still that wicked smirk. "Nonsense. They know I am out & about. 
Unconcerned for my disappearance & habits. Only one knows I am... 'stalking' 
you. He seemed.... indifferent to the fact I was doing this." Nor did he know 
of her plans. Only Empath knew of her plans. 

Empath. & she was to assasinate her comrade. Would be difficult for one. 
Decepticons are not that easy to terminate. 

"In fact... if I would return now to the base, they may see that as.. 
unusual. Considering, I was only supposed to be observing from a distance." 
cocking her head, "It ws indeed you who I am most curious about. I wished to 
know if it was true... that you are the product of the fusion of Megatron & 
Galvatron." Looking him up & down. "Seems the story is true." pause. "For the 
most part. Still... there is more about you that I am unsure of. I'm sure in 
time that all my questions will be answered." 

--part1_1ce.2ce7fdc.2b8083c5_boundary
